hero.title: Discover your signature style
hero.subtitle: Carefully curated women's fashion from emerging designers and timeless brands. Browse our collection online and visit our boutique for personalized styling. New arrivals weekly.

about.title: Curated with Care
about.subtitle: Fashion that reflects you
about.content: Luxe Boutique brings together the best in contemporary women's fashion. From everyday essentials to statement pieces, every item is hand-selected for quality, style, and versatility. Visit us in-store for personalized styling advice.

products.name: Silk Blend Midi Dress
products.description: Elegant midi dress in luxurious silk blend. Perfect for special occasions or elevated everyday wear. Multiple colors available.

products.name: Italian Leather Handbag
products.description: Handcrafted Italian leather tote. Timeless design, impeccable quality. The bag you'll carry for years.

products.name: Cashmere Blend Sweater
products.description: Incredibly soft cashmere blend sweater. Versatile layering piece in seasonal colors. Sizes XS-XL.

products.name: High-Waist Tailored Trousers
products.description: Perfectly tailored high-waist trousers. Professional polish with all-day comfort. Available in classic colors.

products.name: Statement Gold Earrings
products.description: Bold yet elegant gold-plated earrings. Add instant sophistication to any outfit. Hypoallergenic.

products.name: Versatile Blazer
products.description: The blazer that does it all. Dress up or down. Impeccable fit and quality construction.

items.text: My favorite boutique! The owner has impeccable taste and always helps me find pieces that actually work for my lifestyle. Quality is exceptional.
items.author: Emma Chen
items.title: Regular Customer

items.text: Love that I can browse online and then try things on in-store. The curated selection makes shopping so much easier. Found my wedding guest dress here!
items.author: Sofia Martinez
items.title: Happy Shopper
